Synopsis: Creates an email object for carbon copy (CC) recipients.
Description: This function creates an email object specifically for carbon copy (CC) recipients. It takes an array of email addresses and returns a custom object representing the CC recipients.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$CCRecipients = EmailCC -Addresses 'cc1@example.com', 'cc2@example.com'
Creates an email object with two CC recipients.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
$CCList = 'cc1@example.com', 'cc2@example.com'
$CCRecipients = EmailCC -Addresses $CCList
Creates an email object with multiple CC recipients.
